ygData.subject: Re: Ysheka
ygData.msgSnippet: A subscription to Allakhazam is worth it. The search feature takes on a whole new meaning. ... everquest. ... easily ... going when ... if you get ...
ygData.messageBody:
A subscription to Allakhazam is worth it. The search feature takes on
a whole new meaning.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
> Go to maps.eq-toolbox.com and you can download ingame maps for
everquest.
> I don't know if I've ever been to broken skull.. I tend to get lost
easily
> even with maps. Kinda hard to concentrate on just where you're
going when
> invis wears off and you have a train of mobs on your tail.
> Hey, does anyone know if you can search for charm slot only items
if you get
> a subscription to allakhazam? I want to see what charms are
available and so
> forth before I combine a charm with my adventurer's stone.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > Thanks for the responses. I do plan to go soon. I don't find much
info
> > on EQ Atlas on Broken Skull. Maps, that's about it. Is it not
drawing
> > much interest? Do we have too many places to go? Or are they just
not
> > keeping the site updated?
> >
> > Barto Proudfoot
> >
